column4: how do I get the on screen keyboard (gok) to launch? I have assistive technologies enabled -- this app http://library.gnome.org/users/gnome-access-guide/stable/gok.html.en
yeah, try typing gok in the terminal
How did u install it? Using apt-get?
its a basic part of gnome, it should always be installed
No. Its not installed. just try "sudo apt-get install gok"
oh my god, thanks man -- that should be considered a bug, not to install assistive technology apps by default
